sources.title: To Know a Jedi - Movie
sources.description: "To Know a Jedi", a fan-made movie inspired by the Star Wars movies of George Lucas. The movie was made by the late Derek Lake, a film student who died in a traffic accident soon after the movie was completed. It tells the story of a group of college students inspired by the Star Wars movies, who try to make their own light sabres. When they succeed, they start to wonder. How much of the Jedi religion is true as well? Following the death of the film's maker, this movie has been placed in the public domain.
